author: Daniel Kline
title: Taco Bell makes a major menu change
text:
Taco Bell makes a major menu change
People talk about the McDonald's Dollar Menu like a long-lost love or a dearly departed pet. The much-lamented offering was exactly what it sounds like — a selection of items that consumers could buy for $1 each.
That was an impressive deal even back in 2013 when the chain discontinued it. The problem, at least for McDonald's (
MCD) - Get Free Report franchise owners, is that customers used the Dollar Menu instead of ordering from the more expensive regular menu.
Basically, customers realized that they could purchase a few items for $1 each and cobble together a meal. The chain had launched the discount offer hoping that people would add the low-margin $1 items to their pricier (and higher margin) combo meals.
Related: Taco Bell's menu embraces a new take on a comfort food classic
That didn't happen, so the chain replaced the Dollar Menu with the more confusing, and less popular, "$1 $2 $3 Dollar Menu." That offering, includes a selection of McDonald's items at the $1, $2, and $3 price points, but in many cases, the only $1 items are small drinks.
Still, the $1 $2 $3 Dollar Menu does offer lower prices on some menu items and it remains a popular option for customers. Now, Yum Brands' (
YUM) - https://secure2.thestreet.com/cap/prm.do?OID=033365&ticker=YUM Taco Bell has revamped its own value menu in a way that's a lot like McDonald's offering.
Taco Bell adding $3 or less Cravings Value Menu
Taco Bell faces the same challenge McDonald's does. It wants to offer value but does not want its customers to solely order low-priced items. To try to balance that the chain is revamping its value menu and giving it a new name.
"Following a successful test at select locations last fall,
Taco Bell today announced the nationwide launch of their new $3 or Less Cravings Value Menu starting January 11, 2024," Fast Food Post reported.
The new menu replaces the long-running "Cravings Value Menu," which offered items at $1, $2, and $3 price points. Taco Bell has not yet shared pricing for its new menu which will include 10 items for $3 or less.
Items offered will include the Cheesy Double Beef Burrito, the Double Stacked Taco, the Spicy Potato Soft Taco, the Cheesy Roll Up, the Cheesy Bean and Rice Burrito, the 3-Cheese Chicken Flatbread Melt, the Chicken Enchilada Burrito, Loaded Beef Nachos, the Stacker, and Cheesy Fiesta Potatoes.
Taco Bell wants to compete in value and premium
While Taco Bell competes with McDonald's and the other burger chains in the value space, it also wants to compete with Chipotle Mexican Grill for higher-end customers. Yum Brands CEO David Gibbs talked about the chain's value efforts during its
third-quarter earnings call.
"Of course, Taco Bell U.S. is in a class of its own in the domestic QSR category as a culturally iconic brand and clear leader in value perception with the most crave-worthy food in the industry. Taco Bell has unmatched menu flexibility, exceptional pricing power, industry-leading unit economics, and world-class franchise partners," he shared.
Taco Bell has also seen customers spend more money — 40% more — when they're members of the company's loyalty program. That's something the chain hopes to develop further in 2024.
"Taco Bell will enhance its loyalty program and provide easier access across channels to earn and redeem points. Additionally, members will enjoy more exclusive experiences, including more digital innovation, early access to new products, and loyalty-enabled and experiences. Eventually, the team will integrate its loyalty program with digital menu boards to create an even more personalized experience," Gibbs added.

author: Emmy Liederman
title: Women are typecast more in US ads than anywhere else
text:
Key stat: 95% of women characters in US ads are portrayed in domestic and family roles, while only 3% are in leadership roles, according to a March 2025 CreativeX report. In worldwide ads, 71% of women characters are portrayed in domestic roles and 20% in leadership roles.
Beyond the chart:
Only a third of all pharmaceutical and healthcare advertising accurately portrays women, who are key decision makers in 80% of healthcare choices, according to a 2024 report from The Association of National Advertisers’ SeeHer initiative. Ads with positive female representation see a 20% lift in choice intent, according to an Ipsos report. Women will control 75% of discretionary spending by 2028, Nielsen projects. Use this chart: Marketers can use this chart to consider more ways to feature women in their campaigns, better reflecting the diversity of their roles.
Related EMARKETER reports:
How Consumers Perceive Ads (EMARKETER subscription required) US Mothers 2024 (EMARKETER subscription required) Methodology: Data is from the March 2025 CreativeX "Gender in Advertising Report 2025." 940,000 advertising assets from 1,195 brands in 159 markets used in 2024 were analyzed in 2025.

author: yahoo
title: ¡Sorpresa! El ex delantero de que saldrá del retiro para jugar en la Kings League
text:
Ex-América ¡Sorpresa! El ex delantero de América que saldrá del retiro para jugar en la Kings League El que también fuera un atacante letal del Tricolor volverá a las canchas para hacer presencia en este certamen que se estrena a nivel Latinoamérica. ¡Portero de hierro! El increíble dato de Luis Ángel Malagón que lo hace destacar en América FIFA revela detalles para clasificar al Mundial de Clubes 2025: ¡América, con doble oportunidad! Por Alejandro Alfaro
29/02/2024 - 12:40hs CST
whatsapp 29/02/2024 - 12:40hs CST
© Club América. Las Águilas podrían sufrir una baja muy sensible en estos días. Por Alejandro Alfaro
La Kings League Américas ya inició y este formato de competencia que nació en Europa llegó a nuestro continente para reunir a streamers, influencers y ex jugadores que regresan a las canchas para de alguna manera seguir en activo como el caso de Luis Hernández , quien fuera delantero de América y también en la Selección Mexicana.
El Matador será el jugador número 13 del equipo Peluche Caligar i, el cual pertenece a Werevertumorro y el Escorpión Dorado. Ahí, el ex atacante se unirá a otros ex futbolistas como el Shaggy Martínez , quien dicho sea de paso, surgió de las divisiones inferiores del Club América; t ambién juega ahí Luis Lozoya , quien estuvo en clubes como Santos y Tijuana.
En sus plataformas oficiales de redes sociales, el equipo Peluche Caligari hizo el anuncio oficial del fichaje de Luis Hernández con un video en el cual hicieron mención de los equipos donde militó en su trayectoria como profesional, así como su etapa en la Selección Mexicana, donde se hizo referente particularmente en el Mundial de Francia 98.
“Pónganse de pie para recibir a uno de los jugadores más históricos de nuestro país: ¡El Matador Hernández! Se une al Peluche Caligari como jugador 13. Un bombazo para nuestro equipo que se escucha ya en toda la Kings League Américas. ¡Nos vemos el domingo!” , fue el mensaje del nuevo equipo del Matador.
ver también
Henry Martín sigue sin renovar con América y lo vinculan nuevamente con el LA Galaxy
¿Cómo le fue a Luis Hernández en América? Luis Hernández formó parte del plantel que obtuvo el título del torneo Verano 2002 con América; sin embargo, no estuvo presente en la Final contra Necaxa debido a que ya estaba concentrado con la Selección Mexicana que fue a la Copa del Mundo de Japón – Corea 2002. En total fueron 54 partidos los que defendió la camiseta azulcrema y con ella anotó 10 goles.
¿Cuándo debuta Luis Hernández en la Kings League? El primer partido que jugará Luis Hernández en la Kings League tendrá lugar el próximo domingo cuando su nuevo equipo enfrente a Raniza FC. Cabe mencionar que en su debut, Peluche Caligari ganó por marcador de 8-3 a Olimpo United , escuadra encabezada por Chicharito Hernández, jugador al cual América enfrentará dentro de unos días en la Concachampions.
Alejandro Alfaro Reportero que cubre desde hace 10 años de manera presencial al Club América. Estudió Ciencias de la Comunicación en la Universidad del Valle de México y trabajó para medios como W Radio, Diario Deportivo ESTO, Agencia Pressport, entre otros. Estuvo en los Mundiales de Clubes 2015 y 2016 junto a las Águilas, cubrió CONCACAF Liga de Campeones en diferentes países, y le realizó seguimiento puntual al club azulcrema por todo el país. Lo verán día a día en Coapa, como un americanista más.
Club América Kings League Luis Hernández Consulta nuestras últimas novedades en Google News

author: 中国经济网 评论频道
title: 无人区岂能无"限"撒野
text:
分享到微信X
打开微信，点击底部的“发现”，使用 “扫一扫” 即可将网页分享到我的朋友圈。
2月28日，青海茫崖市冷湖镇政府与茫崖市文体旅游广电局再次联合发布《茫崖市冷湖镇保护黑独山、石油工业遗址的公告》，明确划定游览红线，严禁擅自进入未开放区域及无人区，违者将面临法律追责。措辞严厉的公告意味着，对部分游客肆无忌惮的破坏，当地已经忍无可忍。
“每一寸土地都镌刻着大自然的鬼斧神工，一旦破坏，难以自然恢复，将造成不可逆的生态损失。”在人们的印象中，官方公告一般很少做这样饱含情绪的表达。由此也侧面印证了当地的生态已经被破坏到了何等程度，以至于在公告的行文中都抑制不住地流露出难以言表的痛心。
不可否认，黑独山之美是难以抵御的诱惑。哪怕这片山地处环境恶劣的无人区，还是依然有驴友不按照预留出入口进出、不走规划出的旅游线路。这些人给自己和救援人员都带来极大的风险，而且部分人破坏原始地貌，乱扔生活垃圾，对自然半分敬意皆无。
对青藏地区来说，保持原貌就是最大的文旅价值，成为网红景点绝非第一要务。冷湖石油老基地和5号油矿这样的人类工业活动遗存，更不是可以随意涂鸦、任由网红恣意妄为之所——别把记录着共和国老一辈艰苦奋斗、困境求生的老工业基地当成甩着喷漆罐各种乱画的行为艺术背景板。虽然经抢救性修复，老基地墙屋涂鸦基本清理干净，但这些建筑已经非常脆弱了。
既然有法可依，那就该有法必依、执法必严，希望不要再有人任性以身试法。“地貌形成需千万年，破坏只需一瞬间”，无人区不意味无限制，每一个户外探险驴友不能无“限”撒野了。
（责任编辑：臧梦雅）

author: Claudia Cox
title: These UK festival Reddit stories are so feral you’ll never want to step foot in a field again
text: These UK festival Reddit stories are so feral you’ll never want to step foot in a field again Festivals make me lose all faith in humanity Look, I know that some people did go to music festivals this summer and have a nice time. But those people are definitely not on Reddit. From toilet explosions to drug-induced witch hunts, here are the most weird, feral and downright disgusting stories from UK festivals which Some of these Reddit stories are so feral you want to never go to festivals, or go anywhere in the UK, or come into contact with another human being every again. You have been warned. Toilets leaking over everything “We purchased coach tickets from London to Glastonbury on the Thursday and unfortunately the coach toilet leaked over everything we owned. Rucksack, 2 x tents, sleeping bag, chairs. Before we even got into the festival we honked of piss. “I bought a new sleeping bag the second we set up and we both tried to deal with the whiff of toilet in our tent for the weekend. Not sure if this is related to piss gate or not but I ended up coming back home on the Sunday due to falling ill with bacterial tonsillitis.” Protesting by peeing at Glastonbury “Two older ladies after Coldplay discussing how the women’s urinals were shut so they, along with others, staged a wee-protest on the fence outside. Husband asks if anyone saw them… ‘I’m sure there were much more interesting fannies to look at than mine or Sarah’s.'” Should’ve just got day passes “We got human sh*t thrown on our tent at Leeds. Safe to say we left it there.” Pooing in front of an audience “Some lass taking a sh*t in an empty dark fruits box while about 30 people stood around in a circle watching and cheering.” True acrobatic skills “One of the urinals was leaking creating a steam of pissy mud. A dude fell face first into it. Didn’t spill his beer.” He must’ve looked like a Scooby Doo monster “Watched one year in horror as a bunch of lads rocked and tipped over a Portaloo with their mate in it. The dude climbed out covered head to toe in sh*t and just started a slow walk of shame to the showers.” Strange rituals at Boomtown “We had to go and speak to a fake pharmacist and have fake jabs so we could go to the Botanica Zoo, where we spoke to one of the animal actors there, and they had to basically test for the animal in us. We had to do loads of stretching. And then we had to wait outside the Temple of Immortal Children to meet The Mother. There were men guarding it with mock spears. The Mother is a bloke dressed up like Gandalf. To summon The Mother, we had to do all sorts of weird sh*t like plant our feet in the ground as our seedling roots then make loads of noise and grow as a seed. In order to be blessed by The Mother, they were like, ‘who was any talents to show?’ A couple of people did handstands. One bloke told everyone on the microphone that he had a foursome with two strippers in Bristol. The Mother was very impressed and awarded him a Botanica spoon. Then The Mother levitated over us on a rope.” A miracle of nature? “Parklife, 2019 springs to mind. I saw a girl by an ice cream van in the birthing position and piss was just streaming out of her. I swear to God I saw a rainbow in it. Anyway her mate in the obligatory neon bikini was trying in vain to protect her mate’s modesty, holding a transparent waterproof up in front of her. It just magnified everything though, and the piss was just spraying all over this waterproof like a plastic shower curtain.” A Harry Potter witch hunt “A bunch of people with torches and fire on sticks running through the campsite, ransacking every tent looking for ‘Harry Potter’. There was a rumour that Daniel Radcliffe might be at the festival and somehow that snowballed into this group of around 30 stragglers off their tits searching for him at 4am.” Showering in piss “T In The Park 2010, a girl went to take a piss in the urinals around the walls on the main area. She had a playsuit on so had to pull it down to her ankles, she was now in the scud, no bra or nothing. Sat on the urinal to pee, the urinal fell, as did she and the drain pipe joining all the urinals together covered her head to toe in piss. She just pulled her playsuit up and away she went like nothing happened. It was amazing.” The only occasion when you wish you’d stepped in dog sh*t “My mate was lying out his box in a tent listening to people walking by. A lassie says to her boyfriend, ‘ehhhh a just stepped in dog shite,’ to which he replied, ‘Have you seen any dogs at T in the Park?’” Does this still count as one of your 5 A Day? “Man wearing nothing but an elephant mask f*cking a melon close to where we were camped. A few hours later, a friend is eating said melon. We tell her about the elephant man. Unfazed, she responded, ‘Hmm, I thought it tasted like cock.'” A Biblical plague of wasps “The year is 2010 and Static X are playing Download festival. There is a massive crowd and its hot as f*ck. Some lad runs past giggling followed by a few mates. He is holding a Tesco bag with a round object in it. The bag is buzzing loudly. Moments later a thick cloud of bees fills the air in front of us easily twice the size of the whole stage. The lad had thrown a damn wasp/bee’s nest into the mosh pit. There was screaming. Static X played the full set.”

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Thursday night rain carries over and sticks around through Friday
text:
By News 12 Staff ,
17 hours ago
News 12 Storm Watch Team Meteorologist Allan Nosoff says Thursday night rain arrives after 4 p.m. and sticks around into Friday evening.
NEXT: Friday will be the coolest and wettest day this week with highs in the 50s. It will be raw, chilly and rainy for most of the day. Periods of moderate rainfall is expected for the morning commute. There will be a few puddles in low lying areas/ poor drainage areas. We have a 50/50 weekend. Mainly dry and slightly milder on Saturday, passing showers and cooler on Mother's Day.
Catch the Brooklyn forecast below:
TONIGHT: Showers before midnight with steady rain approaching the morning commute. Lows down to 51.
TOMORROW: Light to steady rain all day long. A moderate burst is also likely during the morning commute. Temps hover between 50 and 53, feeling like the 40s with 20-25 mph gusts. Lows down to 48 as showers end around 9PM.
SATURDAY: "Nicer" half of the weekend, but not too warm, and partly cloudy. Sunnier before noon, cloudier after noon. Highs near 65. Lows near 53.
SUNDAY: Mother's Day likely sees a few showers, especially from mid-morning through the evening. While it is not expected to be heavy, consider moving any outdoor plans inside. Highs near 63. Lows around 55.
MONDAY: Mostly sunny and mild. Highs near 72. Lows near 57.
TUESDAY: Sun and clouds, and milder. Highs near 77. Lows near 59.
WEDNESDAY: Partly sunny, mild. Chance of showers. Highs 72. Lows near 58.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: David
title: All Saints Catholic Church Hampstead
text:
Church of St Mary, Hampstead Parish 4 Holly Place, London, England from www.churchservices.tv All Saints Catholic Church Hampstead: A Masterpiece of Architecture For centuries, churches have stood as symbols of faith, hope, and community. Among these, the All Saints Catholic Church in Hampstead, with its stunning architecture and intricate design, stands out as a true masterpiece. From its soaring arches to its ornate stained-glass windows, the All Saints Catholic Church is a testament to the skill and creativity of its architects and builders. In this article, we will take a closer look at the church and explore its history, design, and significance. The History of All Saints Catholic Church All Saints Catholic Church was built in the 19th century in Hampstead, a wealthy suburb of London. The church was designed by a team of architects and builders who were inspired by the Gothic Revival movement, which sought to revive the medieval Gothic style of architecture. The church was completed in 1870 and has since become one of the most iconic buildings in the area. The Design of All Saints Catholic Church The design of All Saints Catholic Church is a perfect example of the Gothic Revival style. The church features a tall, pointed roof, arched windows, and intricate stone carvings. The interior is equally stunning, with soaring arches, intricate woodwork, and stunning stained-glass windows. The church also boasts a beautiful pipe organ, which is still played during services today. The Significance of All Saints Catholic Church All Saints Catholic Church is not only a beautiful building but also an important part of the local community. The church has been the site of many important events, including weddings, funerals, and community gatherings. It is also a place of worship for the local Catholic community, who come together to celebrate their faith and support one another. The Restoration of All Saints Catholic Church In recent years, All Saints Catholic Church has undergone a major restoration project to ensure that it remains a beautiful and functional building for many years to come. The restoration project involved repairing the roof, restoring the stained-glass windows, and updating the electrical and heating systems. The project was completed in 2016, and the church now stands as a shining example of historic preservation. Conclusion All Saints Catholic Church is a true masterpiece of architecture, representing the beauty and significance of churches both past and present. Its stunning design and rich history make it a must-see for anyone visiting Hampstead. Whether you are a local resident or a tourist, a visit to All Saints Catholic Church is sure to leave a lasting impression. Table Summary: | Topic | Brief Summary | |—————————————-|——————————————————————————| | The History of All Saints Catholic Church | Built in 1870 in Hampstead, London, inspired by Gothic Revival movement | | The Design of All Saints Catholic Church | Features Gothic Revival style, tall pointed roof, arched windows, stone carvings | | The Significance of All Saints Catholic Church | Important part of local community, site of many events, place of worship for local Catholic community | | The Restoration of All Saints Catholic Church | Completed in 2016, involved major repairs and updates to ensure historic preservation |

author: EP
title: Un ataque armado en Nigeria deja al menos trece muertos - Levante-EMV
text:
EP
Madrid 23 AGO 2024 4:59 Al menos trece personas han muerto en un ataque perpetrado por parte de hombres armados en la comunidad Anguwan Mai-Giro, que se encuentra entre las localidades de Rafi y Shiro, en el estado nigeriano de Níger, en el centro del país africano.
El ataque, que tuvo lugar el miércoles por la noche, ha sido condenado por el gobernador en funciones de Níger, Yajubu Garba, quien ha descrito los hechos como "satánicos, insensibles y atroces". "Es muy desalentador y perturbador que otros seres humanos lleven a cabo un acto tan bárbaro y cruel ", reza un comunicado.
El gobernador ha reafirmado "la determinación y compromiso inquebrantables" de "controlar la ola de inseguridad en el Estado", mientras que ha alentado a las fuerzas de seguridad a "no desanimarse por los ataques a las comunidades", asegurándoles "todo el apoyo".
El noreste de Nigeria es el epicentro de las actividades de Boko Haram y su escisión, Estado Islámico en África Occidental (ISWA) , si bien la inseguridad se ha extendido a otras zonas del centro, el norte y el noroeste, haciendo saltar las alarmas sobre la posible expansión de estas redes terroristas y criminales.
TEMAS
